name: Tuebor: A Graphic Novel Battleground PvP Video Game.
blurb: Science fiction PvP battleground game, with a continuously evolving player driven graphic novel story. Arathi Basin meets Blade Runner!

rewards.reward: Level 1 - Minion for the Cause.\r\nA very special thank you on our official site, in the game credits, select game champions unlocked at game launch, and exclusive Closed Beta access, your choice of dog tags with full color faction emblem, and a mental and spiritual high-five from the development staff. (Add $2.00 for international shipping of dog tags)

Level 2 - Recruit for the Cause.\r\nPrior rewards + five 4"x6" full color photo prints of the illustrations of the heroes of your choice, more select heroes and modes unlocked at game launch, and all 4 faction emblem dog tags. Talk about schwag! (Add $2.00 for international shipping).
Level 3 - Champion for the Cause.\r\nPrior rewards + 1/2 of all the heroes and modes unlocked at game launch, and an exclusive Kickstarter sponsor only Beta Champion skin.
Level 4 Early Bird !\r\n\r\nThe $60 reward tier for $10 less!

Level 4 - Elite Champion for the Cause.\r\nPrior rewards + all heroes and modes unlocked at the game launch and an exclusive Kickstarter sponsor only Beta Elite skin, an exclusive download of all of our game music on mp3, and finally a year 7235 (the first year the game takes place) Killa-K 12-month sci-fi-pin-up calender (yowza!). (Add $5.00 for shipping.)

Level 5 - Honored Faction Champion.  All prior rewards, a screen printed Tuebor t-shirt, and access to our private internal developers forum for the ability to converse directly with the developers during game development.

Level 6 - Renowned Faction Champion.\r\nPrior rewards +  an exclusive Kickstarter sponsors only Renowned Faction skin, digital edition download of all of our illustration art and its creation filled with behind the scenes sketches, notes, and revisions, and extremely limited Alpha testing access as well as all game modes unlocked at launch, and finally a limited print edition, individually numbered, signed by the artist, Tuebor Origins graphic comic (this comic will not be reprinted)

Level 7 - Faction Founder.\r\nPrior rewards + all heroes, game modes, skins, boosts, and content unlocked at game launch, as well as all future game content automatically unlocked as it is released over the life of the game, a 24"x36" full color high gloss poster of your choice of faction hero illustration art signed by the development staff, and finally a Kickstarter sponsor only Faction Founder skin.

Level 8 - Alpha Leader.\r\nPrior rewards + an exclusive Kickstarter sponsor only Alpha skin, and you will be allowed to create a non-game recurring character for our story line comic.  This character will appear in various weekly and overarching story line graphic comics.  You will get to work with the graphic artist to design the look of the hero as well as our story writer to create the back story (how cool is this!)

Level 9 - Puppet Master of the World.\r\nPrior rewards + you will be able to create a hero (subject to development team balancing and launch date), his or her skills, name, appearance, and 3 alternate skins.  Your voice (if you choose) will be used somewhere in-game (non-hero) and you will receive a Kickstarter sponsor only Puppet Master skin for select game launch heroes, 5 fully unlocked accounts with the Pupper Master skin to give to your friends, and finally you will receive official development credit for the game on our website and in the game credits.

Level 10 Early bird.  In addition to all prior rewards, and the full $10,000 reward, the first 12 people to fund this level will receive a 5 foot tall, chainsaw carved wood statue of Dusk.  That's right, no wimpy plastic nine inch toy, a full 5 foot tall carved statue by a master carver.  NOTE: YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL SHIPPING AND HANDLING CHARGES.  THIS WILL LIKELY WEIGH SEVERAL HUNDRED POUNDS.

Level 10 - The Immortal Hero for the Cause.\r\nPrior rewards + An exclusive party hosted in honor of the donors at this level. You and one guest will be able to attend a party with our development staff as well as some of the celebrity actors who will voice some of the heroes for our game.  An in-game territory will have a shrine dedicated to your personal likeness and you will receive an ultra exclusive Kickstarter sponsor only Deus skin, and finally you will be given 10 fully unlocked accounts to provide to your friends, each with the Dues skin. Note: You will be responsible for all travel and housing costs.
